techmeme.title: STMicro reports Q3 net revenue down 25% YoY to $3.25B and expects FY 2024 revenue to fall 25% YoY to ~$13.27B, at the lower end of its $13.2B to $13.7B forecast (Christina Kyriasoglou/Bloomberg)
Analysis: Taiwan has become Asia's best performing major stock market in 2024 thanks to TSMC and others, which make almost all of the critical AI hardware (Bloomberg)
Many long-time game workers are ditching large productions in favor of smaller teams, enabled by growing accessibility of Unreal Engine and other powerful tools (Jason Schreier/Bloomberg)
Chinese and Israeli academics predict the AI boom will increase global e-waste by 3% to 12% by 2030, or up to 2.5M metric tons of additional e-waste each year (Gerrit De Vynck/Washington Post)
CCDH: of 283 X posts in 2024 with false election claims that Community Notes members had responded to, only 20 had notes with enough votes to be publicly shown (Washington Post)
